attributes.action: look into and stop the  high numbers of houses being planned for Cornwall being built on greenfield sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
.This Country needs all our green field land to produce our food.
Land is a product that is not made anymore; there is enough brown field sites for the buildings that is required. I would also ask the Prime Minster to instruct the planners to see that the infrastructure is in place before planning is granted.
